“In life there are two types of people, those who work in
the light; exemplarily, honourably, and a beacon for the
And then you have those who work in the dark; those who do
the killing, those who shovel the waste off the streets,
those who take the blame for the sins of our world.
Without either, the world crumbles.” - Director of Shadows
